alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Harrison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:07PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT BOURBON...NICHOLAS AND HARRISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1206 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Cynthiana to Bryan Station. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paris, Cynthiana, Carlisle, Breckinridge, Millersburg, North Middletown, Blacks Crossroads, Ellisville, Stony Point and Bunker Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Locally heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding, or aggravate any lingering flooding from last night. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
